title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset password from Settings > Security.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase.

title: Account Verification
content: After registration, users must verify their email address using the verification link sent to their inbox.

title: Change Email Address
content: Users can update their email address from Profile Settings > Account Information.

title: Update Profile
content: Go to Profile > Edit Profile to update your personal details like name and phone number.

title: Delete Account
content: To permanently delete your account, go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action cannot be undone.

title: Payment Failure
content: If payment fails, please check your card details or try another payment method. Contact support if the issue persists.

title: Subscription Cancellation
content: Users can cancel their subscription anytime from Settings > Subscription. Access will continue until the billing cycle ends.

title: Technical Support
content: For technical issues, contact support via Help Center or email support@yourcompany.com.

title: Data Privacy
content: We ensure that all user data is securely stored and not shared with third parties without consent.
